company.details: 3Scale provides plug-and-play as well as enterprise level API management services. 3Scale is similar to 3Scale connect is a starter platform with a freemium model for delivering your API. This model is well suited to those who are not sure of their API business model or target audience — or are just looking to test the waters.

The ameescore enables businesses to re-envision their supply chain and their own performance in the cont
company.details: At amee, we provide clear actionable insight into the environmental costs and risks associated with core business and supply chain operations.Through our unique ameescore, available on every UK firm, businesses can translate environmental data into tangible risks, cost savings and improvements. The ameescore enables businesses to re-envision their supply chain and their own performance in the context of their peers and identify opportunities for tangible change. For the first time, UK businesses have an effective means to treat environmental data with the same transparency, consistency and detail as financial data to drive bottom line improvements and mitigate risks.

company.details: Winner of Business Journal’s Startup Of The Year 2014, CDScience provides next-generation commerce technology that allows businesses to deliver ecommerce everywhere. Our Universal Retail APIs organize millions of the most trending ecommerce products from the world’s top retailers and delivers product feeds through a unified set of APIs that help businesses drive revenues through ecommerce and targeted mobile ads. Our Universal Wishlists and Price Notification Engine provides radical re-engagement tools that continually drive users back into clients’ apps. Our proprietary indexing engines track over a billion data points on millions of ecommerce products daily. Our platforms are uniquely designed to graph explicit purchase intent coupled with the effects of price deltas, social chatter and influencer impact on retail trends and purchase conversions.

company.details: A complete solution for email marketers and ESPs. The most comprehensive API for realtime email validation, email list validation, and automating daily list maintenance with Email Assurance. Check email list quality, or monitor list quality over time with free vetting tokens included with every plan. Analyze the quality of an email address at the point of signup. Our API can handle extremely high volume. Clean email lists quickly and receive comprehensive email deliverability data on each email address. Your entire list is returned to you with Email Assurance grades ranging from A+ to F. Automate your email list maintenance with our API. Protect your deliverability by integrating the complete Email Assurance solution. Set up daily list monitoring, weekly list maintenance, and the realtime email validation behind your webform. We analyze all email data daily, ensuring that your email list is always ready for deployment.

company.details: Datumbox offers a powerful open-source Machine Learning Framework written in Java. Discover today its large collection of algorithms, models, statistical tests and tools. The Datumbox API offers a large number of off-the-shelf Classifiers and Natural Language Processing services which can be used in a broad spectrum of applications including: Sentiment Analysis, Topic Classification, Language Detection, Subjectivity Analysis, Spam Detection, Reading Assessment, Keyword and Text Extraction and more. All services are accessible via our powerful REST API which allows you to develop your own smart Applications in no time.

Using the concepts of labels and pods, it groups the containers which make up an app
company.details: Manage a cluster of Linux containers as a single system to accelerate Dev and simplify Ops. Kubernetes is an open source orchestration system for Docker containers. It handles scheduling onto nodes in a compute cluster and actively manages workloads to ensure that their state matches the users declared intentions. Using the concepts of labels and pods, it groups the containers which make up an application into logical units for easy management and discovery.

company.name: Mozilla Open Badges
company.summary: A digital badge is an online representation of a skill you’ve earned. Open Badges take that concept one step further, and allows you to verify your skills, interests and achievements through credible organizations. And because the system is based on an open standard, you can combine multiple badges from different issuers to tell the complete story of your achievements — both online and
company.details: A digital badge is an online representation of a skill you’ve earned. Open Badges take that concept one step further, and allows you to verify your skills, interests and achievements through credible organizations. And because the system is based on an open standard, you can combine multiple badges from different issuers to tell the complete story of your achievements — both online and off. Display your badges wherever you want them on the web, and share them for employment, education or lifelong learning.

company.name: MuckRock
company.summary: MuckRock is a collaborative news site that brings together journalists, researchers, activists, and regular citizens to request, analyze & share government documents, making politics more transparent and democracies more informed. The site provides a repository of hundreds of thousands of pages of original government materials, information on how to file requests, and tools to make the request
company.details: MuckRock is a collaborative news site that brings together journalists, researchers, activists, and regular citizens to request, analyze & share government documents, making politics more transparent and democracies more informed. The site provides a repository of hundreds of thousands of pages of original government materials, information on how to file requests, and tools to make the requesting process easier. In addition, MuckRock staff and outside contributors do original reporting and analysis of many of the documents received through the site. MuckRock's unique form of investigative and accountability journalism has been recognized by the Sunlight Foundation, The Freedom of the Press Foundation, and hundreds of local and national news outlets for its groundbreaking work in areas such as government spending, surveillance, and public safety.

company.name: Pop Up Archive
company.summary: Pop Up Archive makes sound searchable. Search is a big deal. So why are we limited to only searching text? We get Google alerts every time someone types our name on the web, but not every time someone says our name. Pop Up Archive helps solve this problem by making spoken word searchable. Using speech-to-text software built for specific industries, we enable media companies and institutions like N
company.details: Pop Up Archive makes sound searchable. Search is a big deal. So why are we limited to only searching text? We get Google alerts every time someone types our name on the web, but not every time someone says our name. Pop Up Archive helps solve this problem by making spoken word searchable. Using speech-to-text software built for specific industries, we enable media companies and institutions like NPR, KQED, Princeton, Stanford to find, reuse, and monetize media. Rich media search provides accessibility, search engine optimization, and advertising opportunities.

company.name: Project Chronos
company.summary: This platform originates from the Hackathon SpaceApps Challenge 2014 and integrates information about space missions from NASA, ESA, and JAXA with our learn-by-playing paradigm to let you dive into space knowledge in an exciting way!The next era of space exploration will be driven by distributed and open exploration ventures. Thousands of rovers and micro-probes will be surfing the System, control
company.details: This platform originates from the Hackathon SpaceApps Challenge 2014 and integrates information about space missions from NASA, ESA, and JAXA with our learn-by-playing paradigm to let you dive into space knowledge in an exciting way!The next era of space exploration will be driven by distributed and open exploration ventures. Thousands of rovers and micro-probes will be surfing the System, controlled by many private and public institutions and, eventually, by private citizens, with the goal of collecting and sharing data. Space is too vast to have restricted access: cheap technologies (micro-satellites, social participation, open challenges, private launchers), multidisciplinarity, and always more specialized knowledge are taking part to the race.

company.name: Puppet Labs
company.summary: Puppet Labs develops IT automation software. The company’s flagship products, Puppet and Puppet Enterprise, are designed to allow companies to automate configuration management and infrastructure, cut costs and help organizations better handle infrastructure management at scale.

company.name: QI Bench
company.summary: Quantitative imaging applications such as imaging biomarkers advance the utility of medical imaging. They may detect and characterize disease, before, during or after a course of therapy. They may also predict the course of disease, with or without therapy.

company.name: Rackspace
company.summary: Rackspace is a recognized leader in the IT hosting market. We deliver enterprise-level managed services to businesses of all sizes and kinds around the world. Serving more than 14,000 customers in eight data centers worldwide, Rackspace integrates the industry’s best technologies and practices for each customer’s specific need and delivers it as a service via the company’s promis
company.details: Rackspace is a recognized leader in the IT hosting market. We deliver enterprise-level managed services to businesses of all sizes and kinds around the world. Serving more than 14,000 customers in eight data centers worldwide, Rackspace integrates the industry’s best technologies and practices for each customer’s specific need and delivers it as a service via the company’s promise of Fanatical SupportÂ®. We serve as an extension of our customers’ IT departments, enabling them to focus on their core business. We got started in 1998 and since then Rackspace has grown more than 50 percent a year. There are currently 2,000 Rackers around the world serving our customers.

company.name: ReliefWeb
company.summary: ReliefWeb is a leading source of information on global crises and disasters. Our continuous coverage and archive going back to the 1970s makes ReliefWeb an unparalleled resource for both current and historical data on humanitarian response.
company.details: ReliefWeb is a leading source of information on global crises and disasters. Our continuous coverage and archive going back to the 1970s makes ReliefWeb an unparalleled resource for both current and historical data on humanitarian response.

company.name: Sensr.net
company.summary: We'll keep track of interesting images and alert you when something happens. We're starting off with basic motion detection. We keep the images around and organize them by time and day. We'll send you an email or a text message if you'd like when we detect something. Heading out of town for the weekend? Leave your camera pointed at the front door. If someone comes in, we'll text you. You can also
company.details: We'll keep track of interesting images and alert you when something happens. We're starting off with basic motion detection. We keep the images around and organize them by time and day. We'll send you an email or a text message if you'd like when we detect something. Heading out of town for the weekend? Leave your camera pointed at the front door. If someone comes in, we'll text you. You can also share your cameras with your friends or the whole world. We encourage sharing, but it's best not to share cameras located in ultra private spaces. Sorry, we don't allow adult content on our site. There are plenty of other places on the Internet if you're looking for that kind of stuff.

company.name: Shoeboxed
company.summary: Shoeboxed makes it easy for consumers and businesses to manage receipts and business cards. Shoeboxed Inc was founded in 2007 by Internet entrepreneur Taylor Mingos. Shoeboxed is headquartered in Durham, NC near the Research Triangle Park (RTP). Shoeboxed is funded by a number of Internet investors, including Michael Brehm, one of the founders of the popular German social networking site, studiVZ.

Shoeboxed is headquartered in Durham, NC near the Research Triangle Park (RTP). company.name: Skimlinks
company.summary: Skimlinks is a London-based company started in 2006. Their key products are SkimLinks, a simplified affiliate marketing tool for publishers, and SkimWords, a product that turns product references into monetizable shopping links. SkimLinks converts existing links into affiliate marketing links, and SkimWords recognizes unambiguous product references in editorial and user-generated content, and turn
company.details: Skimlinks is a London-based company started in 2006. Their key products are SkimLinks, a simplified affiliate marketing tool for publishers, and SkimWords, a product that turns product references into monetizable shopping links. SkimLinks converts existing links into affiliate marketing links, and SkimWords recognizes unambiguous product references in editorial and user-generated content, and turns these into unobtrusive shopping links that can earn the publisher money.

company.name: Subledger
company.summary: Accounting engine for developers. We automate bookkeeping for your application. Subledger is a modern double-entry ledger and financial report API for mobile and web app developers. Subledger’s purpose is to give developers the tools to maintain more accurate, detailed and actionable financial information than they would if they built it themselves.
company.details: Accounting engine for developers. We automate bookkeeping for your application. Subledger is a modern double-entry ledger and financial report API for mobile and web app developers. Subledger’s purpose is to give developers the tools to maintain more accurate, detailed and actionable financial information than they would if they built it themselves.

company.name: TaDaweb
company.summary: The TaDaweb Creator lets you create advanced web recipes. A web recipe can be compared to an automatic process that collects, transforms, and combines information. They are quick and easy to create because they are based on human, rather than computer logic. Recipes can be created by users, with TaDaweb also providing the option to create recipes on demand.
company.details: The TaDaweb Creator lets you create advanced web recipes. A web recipe can be compared to an automatic process that collects, transforms, and combines information. They are quick and easy to create because they are based on human, rather than computer logic. Recipes can be created by users, with TaDaweb also providing the option to create recipes on demand.

company.name: taxamo
company.summary: We understand that the world of EU VAT compliance can be quite complex. That is why we have created a simple solution that eases the compliance burden for the developers, and the owners, of e-commerce websites across the globe.

company.name: The Open Cognition Project
company.summary: OpenCog is a unique and ambitious open-source software project. Our aim is to create an open source framework for Artificial General Intelligence, intended to one day express general intelligence at the human level and beyond.

The right talent is hard to find, and while you may not hire every day, you want to grow every day in big and small wa

With our innovative tools, scalable workflows and real-time insights, SMBs and fast-growing businesses can now hire with confidence. The right talent is hard to find, and while you may not hire every day, you want to grow every day in big and small ways. As the pioneer of recruiting platforms and having helped businesses for over five years, The Resumator is primed to deliver what your require to accomplish your corporate goal – the talent to grow

company.name: UK Commission for Employment and Skills
company.summary: We are a publicly funded, industry-led organisation that offers guidance on skills and employment issues in the UK. UKCES is an executive non-departmental public body, sponsored by the Department for Business, Innovation & Skills.
company.details: We are a publicly funded, industry-led organisation that offers guidance on skills and employment issues in the UK. UKCES is an executive non-departmental public body, sponsored by the Department for Business, Innovation & Skills.

company.name: Wordnik
company.summary: Wordnik.com is an online English dictionary and language resource that provides dictionary and thesaurus content, some of it based on print dictionaries such as the Century Dictionary, the American Heritage Dictionary, WordNet, and GCIDE. Wordnik has collected a corpus of billions of words which it uses to display example sentences, allowing it to provide information on a much larger set of words
company.details: Wordnik.com is an online English dictionary and language resource that provides dictionary and thesaurus content, some of it based on print dictionaries such as the Century Dictionary, the American Heritage Dictionary, WordNet, and GCIDE. Wordnik has collected a corpus of billions of words which it uses to display example sentences, allowing it to provide information on a much larger set of words than a typical dictionary.

company.name: World Population Project
company.summary: Population.io aims to make demography – the study of human populations – accessible to a wider audience. We believe that demographic data can play an important role in understanding the social and economic developments of our time. Our hope is that people from all walks of life, in all ages and across all countries will explore a new perspective of their own life and find their own pla
company.details: Population.io aims to make demography – the study of human populations – accessible to a wider audience. We believe that demographic data can play an important role in understanding the social and economic developments of our time. Our hope is that people from all walks of life, in all ages and across all countries will explore a new perspective of their own life and find their own place in the world of today and tomorrow.

company.name: YunoHost
company.summary: YunoHost is a server operating system aiming to make self-hosting accessible to everyone.
